alert.note: Alert for Portage (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:04AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Portage and western Waushara Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 504 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pittsville to 8 miles north of Dellwood to near Wonewoc. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wautoma around 545 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Coloma, Coddington, Wild Rose, Hancock, Emmons Creek Barrens, Kellner, Keene, Heffron, Almond and Blaine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
